items.question: Where can I find a song I heard during the show?`
items.answer: A This Is Us soundtrack, including scene descriptions, can be found on TuneFind.

items.question: What are the songs from the Pilot
items.answer: "Death With Dignity" by Sufjan Stevens"Hands to Myself" by Selena Gomez"Put Your Bags Down" by Adam Cohen"Watch Me" by Labi SiffreYou can find the complete list of songs from every episode, with scene descriptions, here -This is Us Music
